content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. Solution 1:

3. Moving 7 steps counter-clockwise from the Norwich Terrier brings us to the printer.
4. Moving 13 steps clockwise from the printer brings us to the Norwich Terrier.

Therefore, the final answer is: Norwich Terrier.
